      • finalizeAggregation

        public org.apache.hadoop.io.DoubleWritable finalizeAggregation()
        Description copied from class: AbstractAggregator
        Finalizes the aggregation on a master task. This is intended to be overridden by the user and is just an empty implementation in this class (returns null).
        Overrides:
        finalizeAggregation in class AbstractAggregator<org.apache.hadoop.io.DoubleWritable>
